reviewText: Great video just don't expect to be a expert when you buy it you have to buy all of the Capoeira DVDs and the Capoeira workout DVD or book too and you may have to watch some YouTube videos to get some of the moves down and practice with some capoeria people in the park and most important you need a big room or a portable DVD player for that outside feeling. Get the portable DVD player
Worth price if you want to learn basics
very easy to follow and am learning this interesting art. thanks
